interfaces

Interface CanvasContent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsciiTypable, Clickable, FunctionTypable, Typable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, FormWrapper

    public interface CanvasContent
extends Typable, Clickable
    An interface for classes that need to be displayed in the canvas window

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearFocus()
      Called when the focus from the container of this canvas content is switched.
      int getHeight()
      Get the height of this content.
      int getWidth()
      Get the width of this content.
      void show(java.awt.Graphics g)
      A function to draw the class
